John Wiggins is an award winning sound designer for TV and films and in 2017 won honorable mention at MA/IN InterMedia and Luc Ferrariís ìPresque Rienî competition. Using only sounds he records himself, he assembels short ìsound filmsî, made from everyday objects. ||| I record all the sounds I use in my studio and in the field. I only use ìM/Sî stereo mic techniques because I can more easily manipulate the resulting ìthree tracksî. I listen to my environment and record it. Then compose with dynamics, space, timbre, unfamiliarity, fun! Edited, mixed and combined - I find myself. Think Outside was made with recordings from January ñ March 2018.
